update supplier set supplier_name = #{supplierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postcode = #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, register_time = #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER} where supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
